-- Anachronox --

Anachronox straps on the box that Melchana tosses him and presses 
his hand to it. "What is supposed to happen Melchana?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Melchana: Follow me!
> 
> She grabs Gesper and drags him the nearest she can to the piloting 
> room. She leaves him on the floor, goes into the room, and brings 
back 
> some sort of techno-organic "metal" box. She throws one at 
Anachronox.
> 
> Melchana: Strap it around his chest and press your hand on it.
> 
> She straps it on Gesper, presses her hand and backs off one foot. 
The 
> cold form of her brother, still in semi-stasis lock, is then 
filled by 
> some kind of warm energy. It is enough to break the lock and bring 
him 
> to consciousness. He was not as strong as he usually was, but he 
was 
> back.
> 
> Gesper: Where am I? What happened?
> 
> Jetstorm: Hehe! Nothing a good bath can't shake away!
> 
> Belthassan, on the other hand, was cold too. He was not as bad as 
his 
> brother was but still...
